data.name: Larvesta

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.

data.name: Larvesta
data.flavorText: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

data.name: Larvesta
data.flavorText: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

data.name: Larvesta
data.flavorText: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.

data.name: Larvesta
data.flavorText: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

data.name: Larvesta

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

data.name: Larvesta

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

data.name: Larvesta

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

data.name: Larvesta
data.flavorText: When battling opponents, it sprays fire from its five horns. The max temperature of the flames can reach nearly 5,500 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Larvesta

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: It protects itself with flame. Long years ago, people believed Larvesta had a nest on the sun.

data.name: Larvesta

attacks.name: Flame Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: It protects itself with flame. Long years ago, people believed Larvesta had a nest on the sun.

data.name: Larvesta
data.flavorText: The people of ancient times believed that Larvesta fell from the sun.

data.name: Larvesta

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon was called the Larva That Stole the Sun. The fire Larvesta spouts from its horns can cut right through a sheet of iron.

data.name: Larvesta
data.flavorText: In ancient times, Larvesta was worshiped as the emissary of the sun. However, it was also viewed as a burden since it often caused forest fires.

data.name: Larvesta

attacks.name: Peck Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.
